items.title: Massive 74% discount strikes NZXT’s aluminum Function Elite Hall effect gaming keyboard, now just $50 (All-time low)
items.summary:
Over at Amazon, you’ll find NZXT’s Function Elite Hall effect gaming keyboard in white down at $49.99 shipped. This particular keyboard launched earlier this year at $200 and has fetched as much as $190 in recent months. It recently dropped to the $80 mark, but today’s deal takes a huge chunk of its price tag with a straight-up $140 discount. That’s $30 less than its previous all-time low, making this a new best price to beat. You can also get this model in black, though it’s currently fetching $160 with a relatively lighter deal. Head below for more details.
